attributes.action: Form a National Government of all the talents.
attributes.additional_details:
At least twice during the 20th Century a National Government was formed during periods of national crisis. 
 Notably during WW2 when significant reforms to state education and health care were initiated.

There are many individuals across both houses who have the capability and vision  to work constructively together and lead us out of this constitutional crisis. The National Government should last for no more than 3 years.
attributes.background:
The British Parliament is at an impasse of it's own making.
We call upon  Parliament to debate as a matter of urgency forming a new National Government representative of all the parliamentary parties with immediate effect.
